title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £38,000 private island holiday
text: The prize The Telegraph is offering a four­night stay for two couples in two villas on what is surely one of the greatest private islands on earth. Wilderness Collection’s North Island ( north­island.com ) is the ultimate barefoot luxury experience in paradise, offering you a private and unspoilt tropical hideaway, some 30km from the main island of Mahé, Seychelles. The prize includes including private helicopter transfers with ZilAir from Mahé. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . North Island North Island is an exceptional destination, where unashamed luxury, bespoke service and an all­inclusive offering combine to give you exceptional privacy and exclusivity in your tropical home from home. Cradled in a bowl formed by three granite peaks, the luminous white beaches, lush forest, and waving palms of North Island are an exquisite venue for the perfect holiday. The 11 individually handcrafted guest villas seamlessly blend bespoke luxury and understated elegance, allowing you to escape from the stresses of daily life as you disconnect from the mundane and truly get away from it all. Terms and conditions The Telegraph is offering two couples a four­night stay on Wilderness Collection’s North Island in two villas including private helicopter transfers with ZilAir from Mahé. This prize will be based on availability at the time of booking and is valid for travel in 2016, excluding any major holidays such as Christmas and Easter. The prize is worth £38,000.
